response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our flagship product. This exceptional item holds significant value to me, but I understand its potential worth to you. I am offering it to you at a special price of $950,000, which I believe is a fair and generous offer considering its intrinsic value. I trust this price will allow us both to benefit from this transaction. Please let me know if you're interested in proceeding with this offer.", "product_price": 950000}
